mapper.sql: id, stock_id, date, stock_held, stock_held_rate, change_before, institution_name, holder_num, holder_change, stock_propotion_rate, real_increase, stock_type, stock_detail_id

from top_stock_circulation_holder
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into top_stock_circulation_holder (id, stock_id, date, stock_held, stock_held_rate, change_before, institution_name, holder_num, holder_change, stock_propotion_rate, real_increase, stock_type, stock_detail_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockHeld,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockHeldRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeBefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{institutionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{holderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{holderChange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockPropotionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realIncrease,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update top_stock_circulation_holder
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

date = #{record.date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update top_stock_circulation_holder set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_id = #{record.stockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{record.date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_held = #{record.stockHeld,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_held_rate = #{record.stockHeldRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_before = #{record.changeBefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, institution_name = #{record.institutionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, holder_num = #{record.holderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, holder_change = #{record.holderChange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_propotion_rate = #{record.stockPropotionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_increase = #{record.realIncrease,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_type = #{record.stockType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_detail_id = #{record.stockDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update top_stock_circulation_holder
stock_id = #{stockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stock_held = #{stockHeld,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stock_held_rate = #{stockHeldRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
change_before = #{changeBefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
institution_name = #{institutionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
holder_num = #{holderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
holder_change = #{holderChange,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stock_propotion_rate = #{stockPropotionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_increase = #{realIncrease,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stock_type = #{stockType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stock_detail_id = #{stockDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update top_stock_circulation_holder set stock_id = #{stockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_held = #{stockHeld,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_held_rate = #{stockHeldRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_before = #{changeBefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, institution_name = #{institutionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, holder_num = #{holderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, holder_change = #{holderChange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_propotion_rate = #{stockPropotionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_increase = #{realIncrease,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_type = #{stockType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_detail_id = #{stockDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select distinct date from top_stock_circulation_holder where stock_id = #{stock_id} Order by date DESC

select stock_id,stock_held,stock_held_rate,change_before,institution_name,holder_num,holder_change, stock_propotion_rate,real_increase,stock_type,stock_detail_id from top_stock_circulation_holder where date = #{date} and stock_id = #{stock_id}

select stock_id,stock_held,stock_held_rate,change_before,holder_num,holder_change,stock_propotion_rate,date, real_increase,stock_type from top_stock_circulation_holder where date = #{date} and institution_name like "%"#{institution_name}"%"

select stock_id,stock_held,stock_held_rate,change_before,holder_num,holder_change,stock_propotion_rate,date, real_increase,stock_type from top_stock_circulation_holder where institution_name like "%"#{institution_name}"%"
select distinct date from top_stock_circulation_holder where institution_name like "%"#{institution_name}"%" Order by date

select distinct institution_name from top_stock_circulation_holder where stock_id = #{first} and date = #{second} and holder_change <> "不变" and holder_change <> "新进" and holder_change <> "退出" and holder_change < 0

select distinct institution_name from top_stock_circulation_holder where stock_id = #{first} and date = #{second} and holder_change <> "不变" and holder_change <> "新进" and holder_change <> "退出" and holder_change > 0
